law.catch_line: A permit expires on the third anniversary of its effective date, unless the permit is renewed for a ...

text.section: A permit expires on the third anniversary of its effective date, unless the permit is renewed for a 3-year term as provided in this section.

Before its permit expires, the foreign banking corporation may renew the permit for additional 3-year terms if the foreign banking corporation:
At least 30 days before its permit expires submits to the Commissioner a renewal application on the form that the Commissioner requires; and
Meets the requirements for issuance of a permit under § 12-209 of this subtitle.
The Commissioner shall renew the permit of each foreign banking corporation that meets the requirements of this section.
